title: Man Kneeling
description: A man kneeling down on one or both knees. May be used to represent someone in prayer, or a person resting on the floor.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's rendition of the man kneeling emoji presents a figure in a posture of humility, respect, or prayer, rendered with Apple's signature smooth gradients and realistic lighting for a sense of depth and emotion. The figure, depicted with soft rounded edges and a distinct, yet understated, form, conveys a quiet solemnity. On Apple devices, this emoji is often used to express deep reverence, a plea, or a moment of profound contemplation, adding a layer of sincerity to digital communication.
